mapper.select: SELECT `v_seckill_id`, `v_seckill_productId`, `v_seckill_quantity`, `v_seckill_price`, `v_seckill_startDate`, `v_seckill_endDate` , v_sku_name FROM `v-mall`.`v_seckill_product` LEFT JOIN v_sku ON v_sku.`v_sku_id`=v_seckill_product.`v_seckill_productId`
mapper.update: update v_seckill_product set v_seckill_quantity=v_seckill_quantity-1 where `v_seckill_id`=#{vSeckillId} and v_seckill_quantity>0
